contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} The 9th '''[[Eurovision Young Dancers Competition]]''' was held at the [[Linbury Studio Theatre]] in [[London]], [[United Kingdom]] between June 18 and June 24, 2001. ==Winners and Remaining Finalists== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pos !! Country !! Name |- | 1 || [[Image:Flag of Poland.svg|20px]] [[Poland]] || Dawid Kupinski & Marcin Kupinski |- | 2 || [[Image:Flag of Belgium.svg|20px]] [[Belgium]] || Jeroen Verbruggen |- | 3 || [[Image:Flag of the Netherlands.svg|20px]] [[Netherlands]] || Maartje Hermans & [[Golan Yosef]] |- | - || [[Image:Flag of Cyprus.svg|20px]] [[Cyprus]] || Marina Kyriakidou |- | - || [[Image:Flag of Estonia.svg|20px]] [[Estonia]] || Sergei Upkin |- | - || [[Image:Flag of Finland.svg|20px]] [[Finland]] || Johanna Nuutinen |- | - || [[Image:Flag of Germany.svg|20px]] [[Germany]] || [[Thiago Bordin]] |- | - || [[Image:Flag of Greece.svg|20px]] [[Greece]] || Olga Tsimourta & Tina Nasika |- | - || [[Image:Flag of Sweden.svg|20px]] [[Sweden]] || Johan Thelander & Elizaveta PenkÃ³va |- | - || [[Image:Flag of the United Kingdom.svg|20px]] [[United Kingdom]] || Jamie Bond |} {{Eurovision Young Dancers}} [[Category:Eurovision Young Dancers]] [[Category:2001 in the United Kingdom]]
